articles.author: Laura Snapes
articles.title: Magoo: rapper who collaborated with Timbaland, Missy Elliott and Aaliyah dies aged 50 - The Guardian
articles.description: Hailing from then unfashionable Norfolk, Virginia, Timbaland and Magoo’s partnership went on to become a decisive influence on 90s Black music
articles.content:
The rapper Magoo, an early collaborator of producer Timbaland, has died aged 50. No cause of death has been shared.
The news was confirmed by Timbaland, who posted on Instagram: This one hits differ… [+5065 chars]

articles.title: Henry Cavill To Return as Superman in New DC Movie - Inside the Magic
articles.description: We thought we had seen the last of Henry Cavill as Superman, but it turns out DC is not quite done with the actor yet.
articles.content:
Henry Cavill has been replaced by David Corenswet as the Superman of James Gunn’s new DC Universe, but it turns out we have not seen the last of the British actor yet.
